ModMetaData.name: One With Death - Dubs Bad Hygiene Patch
ModMetaData.description:
Compatibility patch between One With Death and Dubs Bad Hygiene.
Effects: - Undead are exempt from hygiene, bladder, and thirst needs (they're dead) - Necromancers with FamiliarWithDeath or OneWithDeath are exempt from bladder and thirst - OneWithDeath necromancers are also exempt from hygiene - Adds hygiene decay rate modifiers for necromancer progression stages
Optional Enhancement (Settings Menu - requires game restart): - Enable "Necromancer Progression Effects" for gradual stat/need changes through progression stages - Matches lore descriptions (UnfamiliarWithDeath now actually reduces hunger/rest) - Gradual power scaling: pain resistance, toxic immunity, temperature tolerance, etc. - DBH integration: hygiene decays faster, bladder/thirst fade with other biological needs - Accelerated aging: body decays faster as it embraces death (10% -> 20% -> 40% -> disabled as lich) - Setting is OFF by default; changing it requires restarting RimWorld
This patch works with DBH's "Override Need Definitions" setting enabled.
Also includes debug actions for testing necromancy states (merged into OWD's debug menu).
